# Cauliflower Al Pastor Tacos {#tacos .unnumbered}

*This is based on <a href="https://www.instagram.com/chefrickmartinez/p/C12ItpGLGr4/?img_index=1">Rick Martinez's great recipe</a>.*

**Ingredients:**  
1 package of achiote (annatto) paste  
1/4 cup olive oil  
1/4 cup orange juice  
3 chipotle chiles in adobo, minced  
4 garlic cloves, minced  
1 teaspoon orange zest  
1 tablespoon honey  
1 tablespoon kosher salt
1 large cauliflower, chopped into 1 inch pieces  
1 small can pineapple chunks
1 onion, thinly sliced  
1/4 cup lime juice  

**Steps:**  
1. Preheat oven to 425.  
2. Combine all ingredients except cauliflower, onions, and pineapple in a big bowl. Add cauliflower, onions, and pineapple and stir to combine.  
3. Roast on two sheet pans pans for 45-55 minutes until the edges are dark and the cauliflower is tender.
